comments:
I20040106

I opened the Synchronize View's view menu (the down-pointing black triangle) and
chose 'Preferences...'. There I changed the setting 'Show all synchronization
information in a resource's text label'. After pressing 'OK', I got the error.

Before it happened, I was fiddling around with flat/hierarchical layout and
updating incoming changes. There was no synchrinization going on in background.
Unfortunately, I couldn't reproduce the error in another workspace. I first
could reproduce it in the original workbench, but not after restarting eclipse.

Fix released to HEAD will be in > I20040226

There were listeners that were not being unregistered.
